Articles.Content:
Trying to get volumetric clouds to work but I can't do it for my life. This is what it looks like right now:

https://imgur.com/bXkVWvJ

Tried the old plugins, and I don't understand the config menu at all. It says Kerbin aurora, Kerbin ciruss clouds, kerbin clouds, etc. It says I'm using AVP and I even downloaded the 43k clouds from the mod page, but to my absolute suprise, nothing changed.
Since this is a paid, closed source add'on, I think you will need to reach the author in his Patreon page as it's very unlikely someone around here will be able to help you on this one.
